content: This is a **list of notable [Singaporean Indians](/wiki/Indian_Singaporeans)**. ## Academicians - [Kishore Mahbubani](/wiki/Kishore_Mahbubani) - [Shan Ratnam](/wiki/Shan_Ratnam) - professor and head of the department of Obstetrics and Gynaecology of the National University Hospital of Singapore - Abhimanyu Goel - Researcher and architect ## Actors, actresses and models - Dalreena Poonam Gill - winner of Miss World Singapore (2014); Singapore football referee - [Gurmit Singh -](/wiki/Gurmit_Singh) popular actor, host and comedy performer; best known for his role in *[Phua Chu Kang Pte Ltd](/wiki/Phua_Chu_Kang_Pte_Ltd)* - [Kumar](/wiki/Kumar_(Singaporean_entertainer)) - comedian, television host, actor, and drag queen - [Michelle Saram](/wiki/Michelle_Saram) - [Nuraliza Osman](/wiki/Nuraliza_Osman) - beauty queen who represented Singapore at the Miss Universe 2002 - [Pilar Arlando](/wiki/Pilar_Arlando) - Miss Singapore World for 2009-2010 - [Rathi Menon](/wiki/Rathi_Menon) - model and beauty pageant titleholder who won the title of Miss Singapore Universe 2014 ## Arts and entertainment - [Haresh Sharma](/wiki/Haresh_Sharma) - Singaporean playwright - [Neila Sathyalingam](/wiki/Neila_Sathyalingam) - Singaporean classical Indian dancer - [T. Sasitharan](/wiki/T._Sasitharan) ## Businessmen - [G. Ramachandran](/wiki/G._Ramachandran) - [Naraina Pillai](/wiki/Naraina_Pillai) - social entrepreneur and businessman - [Thomas Thomas](/wiki/Thomas_Thomas_(politician)) - [Bhupendra Kumar Modi](/wiki/Bhupendra_Kumar_Modi) - [G. S. Sareen](/wiki/G._S._Sareen),[Omni United](/wiki/Omni_United) - [Karan Singh Thakral](/wiki/Karan_Singh_Thakral) - [Saurabh Mittal](/wiki/Saurabh_Mittal) - [Piyush Gupta](/wiki/Piyush_Gupta),banker - [Vinod Kannan](/wiki/Vinod_Kannan) - [Rajeev Suri](/wiki/Rajeev_Suri) ## Criminals - [Gaiyathiri Murugayan](/wiki/Gaiyathiri_Murugayan), maid abuser and killer - [Julaiha Begum](/wiki/Julaiha_Begum), wife of murdered ex-cop T Maniam for instigating her husband's murder. - [Kalidass Sinnathamby Narayanasamy](/wiki/Kalidass_Sinnathamby_Narayanasamy), an army lance corporal sentenced to death for molesting and killing his seven-year-old niece. - [Mathavakannan Kalimuthu](/wiki/Mathavakannan_Kalimuthu), convicted murderer who was granted [clemency](/wiki/Clemency) by then [President of Singapore](/wiki/President_of_Singapore) [Ong Teng Cheong](/wiki/Ong_Teng_Cheong) and placed under [life imprisonment](/wiki/Life_imprisonment_in_Singapore). - [Maniam Rathinswamy](/wiki/Maniam_Rathinswamy) and [S. S. Asokan](/wiki/S._S._Asokan), the two security guards responsible for killing a loan shark. - [Nadarajah Govindasamy](/wiki/Nadarajah_Govindasamy), a businessman executed in 1977 for killing the fianc√© of his daughter - [Surajsrikan Diwakar Mani Tripathi](/wiki/Surajsrikan_Diwakar_Mani_Tripathi), a 20-year-old unemployed man who murdered a jogger at Punggol Field. - [Shanmugam Murugesu](/wiki/Shanmugam_Murugesu), a drug trafficker and former sports athlete who was executed in 2005 - [Somasundarajoo s/o Vengdasalam, Somasundram s/o Subramaniam and Ponapalam s/o Govindasamy](/wiki/Pulau_Senang_prison_riots), the three Indians who were among the eighteen rioters hanged for killing four prison officers during the [Pulau Senang riots](/wiki/Pulau_Senang_riots) - [Vasavan Sathiadew](/wiki/Vasavan_Sathiadew), who killed his foster brother - [S. Nagarajan Kuppusamy](/wiki/S._Nagarajan_Kuppusamy), a lorry driver hanged for killing a prison warden - [Saminathan Subramaniam](/wiki/Saminathan_Subramaniam), a convicted criminal jailed for manslaughter - [Tangaraju Suppiah](/wiki/Tangaraju_Suppiah), drug trafficker - [Bala Kuppusamy](/wiki/Bala_Kuppusamy), serial rapist - [G. Krishnasamy Naidu](/wiki/G._Krishnasamy_Naidu), a former taxi driver sentenced to life imprisonment for killing and decapitating his wife - [Soosainathan Dass Saminathan](/wiki/Soosainathan_Dass_Saminathan), a jobless man hanged for the rape and murder of an Indonesian baby girl - Stephen Francis, Richard James and Konesekaram Nagalingam, the three Indian teenagers hanged for the [Gold Bars triple murders](/wiki/Gold_Bars_triple_murders) of 1971 - [Sagar Suppiah Retnam](/wiki/Sagar_Suppiah_Retnam), a gang leader of [Ang Soon Tong](/wiki/Ang_Soon_Tong) who was executed for killing a bystander during a gang clash - [Anbuarsu Joseph](/wiki/Anbuarsu_Joseph), a gang leader of Gi Leng Kiat who was executed for murder - [Gunasegaran Ramasamy](/wiki/Gunasegaran_Ramasamy), a convicted robber jailed for stabbing a woman to death ## Doctors - [Balaji Sadasivan](/wiki/Balaji_Sadasivan) - [Gopal Baratham](/wiki/Gopal_Baratham) - [Kanwaljit Soin](/wiki/Kanwaljit_Soin) ## Deejays and television personalities - [Anita Kapoor](/wiki/Anita_Kapoor) - [Sharanjit Leyl](/wiki/Sharanjit_Leyl) - reporter, producer and presenter with BBC World News - [Vanessa Fernandez](/wiki/Vanessa_Fernandez) ## Lawyers - [Davinder Singh](/wiki/Davinder_Singh_(lawyer)) - [Eugene Thuraisingam](/wiki/Eugene_Thuraisingam) - Human rights lawyer - [Glenn Knight](/wiki/Glenn_Knight) - Singaporean lawyer and the first Director of the Commercial Affairs Department (CAD) - [Rajesh Sreenivasan](/wiki/Rajesh_Sreenivasan) - [Subhas Anandan](/wiki/Subhas_Anandan) - prominent criminal lawyer in Singapore ## Legal authorities and diplomats - [Dileep Nair](/wiki/Dileep_Nair) - United Nations Under-Secretary-General for Internal Oversight Services; head of the United Nations Office of Internal Oversight Services - [Gopinath Pillai](/wiki/Gopinath_Pillai) - [Kasinather Saunthararajah](/wiki/K._S._Rajah) - Senior Counsel and former Judicial Commissioner of the Supreme Court of Singapore - [Ravinder Singh](/wiki/Ravinder_Singh_(general)) - Singaporean former army general - [Sundaresh Menon](/wiki/Sundaresh_Menon) - Chief Justice of Singapore; former Attorney-General of Singapore; first ethnic Indian to hold both posts - [T. S. Sinnathuray](/wiki/T._S._Sinnathuray) - former Singaporean Supreme Court judge - [Vijaya Kumar Rajah](/wiki/V._K._Rajah) - current Attorney-General of Singapore ## Literary figures - [Chandran Nair](/wiki/Chandran_Nair) - Singaporean poet and retired Director and Mediator of UNESCO - [Edwin Thumboo](/wiki/Edwin_Thumboo) - [Janadas Devan](/wiki/Janadas_Devan) - Singaporean journalist - [M. Balakrishnan](/wiki/M._Balakrishnan) - Singaporean author, popularly known by his pen name Ma Ilangkannan; first Tamil writer to receive the South East Asian Writers Award in 1982 - [V. R. Gopala Pillai](/wiki/V._R._Gopala_Pillai) ## Musicians - [Krissy](/wiki/Lady_Kash_and_Krissy) - rapper and singer - [Lady Kash](/wiki/Lady_Kash) - award-winning international rapper and songwriter - [Paul Abisheganaden](/wiki/Paul_Abisheganaden) - conductor and Cultural Medallion recipient - [Priyadarshini](/wiki/Priyadarshini_(singer)) - playback singer, researcher and performer whose works are predominantly in the [Tamil](/wiki/Tamil_cinema), [Kannada](/wiki/Kannada_cinema), [Telugu](/wiki/Telugu_cinema) and [Hindi](/wiki/Hindi_cinema) cinema industries. - [Shabir](/wiki/Shabir) - award-winning singer-songwriter, record producer, music composer and performer whose works are predominantly in Tamil ## Politicians - [Vivian Balakrishnan](/wiki/Vivian_Balakrishnan) - Minister for Environment and Water Resources - [S. Dhanabalan](/wiki/S._Dhanabalan) - [S. Iswaran](/wiki/S._Iswaran) - [S. Jayakumar](/wiki/S._Jayakumar_(Singaporean_politician)) - politician, diplomat, lawyer and author - [J B Jeyeratnam](/wiki/Devan_Nair) - [Devan Nair](/wiki/Devan_Nair) - 3rd President of Singapore - [Hri Kumar Nair](/wiki/Hri_Kumar_Nair) - [Indranee Rajah](/wiki/Indranee_Rajah) - [K. Shanmugam](/wiki/K._Shanmugam) - Minister for Foreign Affairs - [Tharman Shanmugaratnam](/wiki/Tharman_Shanmugaratnam) - current [President of Singapore](/wiki/President_of_Singapore) - [Pritam Singh](/wiki/Pritam_Singh_(Singaporean_politician)) - [Leader of the Opposition](/wiki/Leader_of_the_Opposition_(Singapore)), Secretary-General of the [Workers' Party](/wiki/Workers%27_Party_(Singapore)) - [Paul Tambyah](/wiki/Paul_Tambyah) - chairman of the [Singapore Democratic Party](/wiki/Singapore_Democratic_Party) and infectious diseases consultant ## Religious - [Rennis Ponniah](/wiki/Rennis_Ponniah) - 9th Bishop of Singapore ## Sportspeople ### Athletics - [C Kunalan](/wiki/C_Kunalan) - [Kesavan Soon](/wiki/Kesavan_Soon) ### Cricket - [Mahadevan Sathasivam](/wiki/Mahadevan_Sathasivam) - [Stacey Muruthi](/wiki/Stacey_Muruthi) ### Football and soccer - [Anumanthan Kumar](/wiki/Anumanthan_Kumar) - Singapore international footballer - [Ram Shanker](/wiki/Ram_Shanker) - [Rhysh Roshan Rai](/wiki/Rhysh_Roshan_Rai) - [Madhu Mohana](/wiki/Madhu_Mohana) - Singaporean footballer ### Tennis - [Rheeya Doshi](/wiki/Rheeya_Doshi) ### Petanque - Shanti Prakash Upadhayay ## Others - [Satheesh Noel Gobidass](/wiki/Satheesh_Noel_Gobidass), victim of an alleged murder case at [Orchard Towers](/wiki/Orchard_Towers) in 2019 - Singapore portal - [List of Malaysians of Indian descent](/wiki/List_of_Malaysians_of_Indian_descent)
title: List of Singaporean Indians
